title: Lovely inside and out.
text: The exterior is like the British museum, the interior spscious, especially the vast circulating areas where thousands can wander around admiring the chandeliers and having a drink. Unklike Covent Garden ther does not semto be a restaurant. Having been to Vienna's eqeuivalent it

title: Guided tour of the theater
text: The tour was excellent! We spent around 1 and half hour visiting the theater, not just were you can sit but also the back stage, the king's booth, the orchestra pit and even enderneth the stage. It is impressive to se how much a single performance requires and how many people

title: Impressive building next to the palace
text: This building combines well with the Residenz on the platz.  We did not get to visit the interior because there were no performances while we were in Munich.  However, we did greatly enjoy it as a backdrop for great pictures.

title: Anniversary treat, 7th April

title: Impressive building next to the palace
text: This building combines well with the Residenz on the platz.  We did not get to visit the interior because there were no performances while we were in Munich.  However, we did greatly enjoy it as a backdrop for great pictures.

title: Stunning
text: We applied for tickets in a ballot long in advance to see La Traviata with Placido Domingo. Having been successful we built a short break around this.The Opera House was simply stunning. Impressive from the outside it’s beauty is surpassed by the interior.We had fantastic seats in the auditorium sixteen rows from the stage. The view was outstanding, seats extremely comfortable with ample leg room.Any visitor should go upstairs where they will find some impressive decor and incredible chandeliers.Whilst numerous attendees wore black tie and evening dress others wore smart casual.Unlike performances in the U.K. the doors to the auditorium are only opened shortly before the performance and when the audience take their seats promptly. Everyone is expected to leave the auditorium during intervals when once empty the doors are closed.This was a fantastic performance of La Traviata with an incredible cast.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Stunning Quality of Opera in a Beautiful Opera House
text: We specifically wanted to see a brilliant Opera Soprano called Pretty Yende in LUCIA DI LAMMAMOUR so applied for tickets extremely early. Thank goodness we did as the performance was Sold Out. Great standard , a beautiful Auditorium, well priced drinks and snacks and a very elegant audience, Worth doing a tour of the house as it's very beautiful
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Pin-point acoustics
text: We found the on-line booking process quite easy from the UK & there was no-problem with the self-printed tickets.  The instructions said to carry ID as well as the ticket, but this was not requested at the door.For the Sunday morning (11am) orchestral concert we were in the 3rd of the 4 balconies. The view was slightly restricted, but we moved, without problem along the row to more central seats at the interval.  We noticed that – even on a Sunday morning – most men wore jackets & women smart clothes. There were no jeans in sight. The Bavarian State Symphony Orchestra was excellent, as one would expect. They were spread out over the (covered) orchestra pit & stage area.  What we noticed most were the pin point acoustics. Even up ‘in the gods’ we could hear even the quietest notes very clearly from all parts of the stage.  Thoroughly recommended for a concert.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Anniversary treat, 7th April
text: Short visit to Munich with the opera Madame Butterfly the highlight. We were not disappointed. The Opera House itself is amazing, breathtaking. We did a”behind the scenes” tour the previous Friday which was so interesting and gave us an insight into how the performance would be managed together with the history of thebuilding which was fascinating. The opera itself was truly magical. ( with German and English subtitles.) Congrats to my husband on such a brilliant Anniversary gift and a memory to treasure.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Wonderful ballet company
text: I saw two ballets: Alice in Wonderland and Anna Karenina. Both shows were wonderful with fabulous dancers. Excellent costumes and sets too. The theatre itself is stunningly pretty. Bar area is nice with good choice of snacks and drinks.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: A Treat for the Opera Lover
text: We saw "Don Giovanni" and loved the performance and appreciated the unique setting/interpretation of this opera.  I noticed some Tripadvisor commentary re: ticket purchases; I purchased online Jan 21 for a March 14 performance and did not have any issues although admittedly, there were not a lot of seat options by that time.  The tickets were available for pick up 1 hour before the performance and the security guards directed us to the correct place to pick them up.  There are German and English translations on a screen over the stage.  Most people were in business/dressy attire.  You are required to check coats, so if you get cold easily bring a wrap to keep with you.  It was a beautiful opera house and a delightful experience.

title: Excellent opera house and company, challenging tickets
text: We wanted to see an opera here while visiting Munich in February, 2019. Check out Larry Z's review, below, with the excellent description of the online ticket purchasing process. By the time we started looking, the first batch of online tickets was sold out, so we had to log on at 10 am Munich time on the designated day for sale of the second batch. We ended up with seats on the main floor in the very last row. Despite that, the acoustics were still very good. The opera company was excellent, as were the leads - the woman performing the role of Abigail in "Nabucco" was astonishing! If you speak only English, be careful where you sit. The opera projects translations over the stage in both English and German, very helpful when the opera is in Italian! But the rearmost 3 or four rows on the main floor are under an overhanging balcony that cuts off view of the top of the stage. You can see the performers just fine, but not the projected translations. Instead, there are small LCD screens attached to the ceiling over you (actually, the underneath of the balcony) that show the translation but only in German. Also, the translations in both languages are NOT literal translations of the dialogue, but instead only summaries. To get the full impact of the dialogue, it is worth reading the libretto ahead of time. Dress: most attendees were in business suits for men, nice to elegant dresses for women - it tends to be a moneyed crowd. The very occasional bluejeans stood out for their rarity, and were worn by only the youngest visitors.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: ticket order step by step
text: Hi, I just messed up my ticket order so decided to share what I wish I'd known before:For non-locals there are two ways to get tickets: A WRITTEN order and an ONLINE order. The WRITTEN is available 3 months ahead and the ONLINE exactly 2 months ahead. Via WRITTEN you choose only the category of seats and the theater chooses the seat for you. Via ONLINE you can actually mark the seat you prefer on a map. In WRITTEN, choosing the category is tricky because the seating map available on site has a color code plus a list of prices that is not fully at sync with the map. I couldn’t figure it out entirely. So either call them or play that roulette.Now, the theater reserves tickets in two batches for the two methods. If you don’t ask for tickets early enough either way - tickets will soon run out.For WRITTEN: write a simple email. They will reply with further procedures. At this point you can also call. They answer quickly and kindly. I tried WRITTEN too late so it was sold out for me. But on the phone they instructed me how and when I should try for the second batch.The ONLINE procedure is somewhat like the black Friday sales. It's Attack and Grab and timing is crucial. My advice: on sales day, connect on every electronic device you have about one hour before the sale begins – enter the Staatsoper site –then Schedule – then find your show- then hit "Tickets". You will be forwarded to a clock countdown page and into a queue. When the Gong hits each device will tell you your place in line. Continue with the device of best position. Wait and relax because you only have one chance at this. When your turn comes, the seating map will appear along with that doomed category list again. Zoom into the map with the mouse scroll. Chose a seat, mark it with a mouse click. I was early in queue and I marked dream seats! But here's when I messed it all up – you see, below the map are two buttons "Chose by map" or "Get best seat for category". DO NOT TOUCH THAT. Instead, scroll back to the TOP of the page to "Add to cart" and advance from there. Obvious isn't it? "Get best seat for category" is another search altogether that has nothing to do with the map. It's that roulette again. I wasn't expecting to find it so I advanced with it because it flashed. Why is it there anyway?! Totally illogical.I clicked it thinking it would get me further, instead I got lost in the system, lost my dream seats and accepting worse instead that were arbitrarily chosen for me. I then got stressed out because they only give you 15 minutes for the process or you lose your position. I hope to enjoy the show nevertheless, going to pay a danm lot for it, flight, hotel and all… Al least I hope to spare this despair from you.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Disappointing nutcracker performance
text: Bought two expensive tickets as a Christmas present to see the nutcracker. It seemed to be a modern interpretation and the only link I saw to the original nutcracker was that Clara (or some other name they changed it to) held a nutcracker toy every few scenes. The costumes were boring, the ballet undramatic. I left the ballet completely undazzled. I was incredibly looking forward to the sugar plum fairy, but most of the acts and music were taken from other Tchaikovsky productions i.e swan lake. Super disappointed, shouldn’t have been allowed to call it the nutcracker.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Unforgettable evening
text: We were lucky enough to hear a gala performance by Edita Gruberova at the opera house. The venue is of surreal beauty and the singing was hauntingly thrilling. We shall never forget her performance of the Don Giovanni aria - singing like that takes decades of experience and

title: Great opera
text: This is the real deal. One of the great opera houses of the world. A fabulous orchestra and the world's top singers. The best Wagner or Strauss you will ever hear.

title: Top quality venue with all the trimmings
text: This is a top-notch opera house - in a fanciful design - lots of pink, cream and chandeliers. The music was sublime. It was quite warm however

title: Amazing Opera House - book a guided tour at the State Opera House in Munich
text: Mostly daily at 2.00 pm  (look at the internet site) there are guided tour at the State Opera House. The tour takes about 1 hour you will get information on the building and most interesting we were able to go back stage. The size is impressive, the technical environment

title: Magnificent Rosenkavalier production
text: I visited the Bayerische Staatsoper in late March 2018, and one of the performances I attended was Rosenkavalier. This was a legendary production by Jürgen Rose and Otto Schenk. The set design was for the second act was such a marvel that it received an applause on its own. Only

title: Unforgettable evening
text: We were lucky enough to hear a gala performance by Edita Gruberova at the opera house. The venue is of surreal beauty and the singing was hauntingly thrilling. We shall never forget her performance of the Don Giovanni aria - singing like that takes decades of experience and feeling to create and we were lucky to witness it. The five or six standing ovations and two encores at the end amid the general uproar were amazing to behold.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Great opera
text: This is the real deal. One of the great opera houses of the world. A fabulous orchestra and the world's top singers. The best Wagner or Strauss you will ever hear.

title: Top quality venue with all the trimmings
text: This is a top-notch opera house - in a fanciful design - lots of pink, cream and chandeliers. The music was sublime. It was quite warm however

title: Amazing Opera House - book a guided tour at the State Opera House in Munich
text: Mostly daily at 2.00 pm  (look at the internet site) there are guided tour at the State Opera House. The tour takes about 1 hour you will get information on the building and most interesting we were able to go back stage. The size is impressive, the technical environment amazing. You will able to see and understand why the Opera in Munich is one of the most prestigious Theater in Europe

title: Magnificent Rosenkavalier production
text: I visited the Bayerische Staatsoper in late March 2018, and one of the performances I attended was Rosenkavalier. This was a legendary production by Jürgen Rose and Otto Schenk. The set design was for the second act was such a marvel that it received an applause on its own. Only afterwards I learned that this was actually the last performance of this production - or so the opera house announced.

title: Bayerische Staatsoper München
text: Når du er i München, Tysklands vakre og neststørste by, er et besøk i operaen et must. Her opptrer byens store sønn, supertenoren og verdenstenoren Jonas Kaufmann, ikke ofte, men noen ganger i året. Fantastisk repetoar i et flott operahus. Solister i verdensklasse, likeså operaorkesteret og dirigenten. Enhver forestilling er en opplevelse for livet!

title: Попасть трудно, впечатления незабываемые
text: Подавали заявку на "Турандот" с Анной Нетребко в самом начале их приема. После ожидания в несколько месяцев получили отказ за отсутствием возможности предоставить нам билеты. В день начала продаж без особой надежды зашли на сайт оперы и смогли купить ваучеры на билеты на хорошие места в партер. Конечно радость была выше ощущения недоумения от происходящего. Билеты нам без всяких проблем распечатали в кассе, все четко организовано и вежливо.Партер оказался маленьким, так что и без участия звезд, которые стремится услышать "весь мир", билеты должны расходиться быстро. Петь Турандот даже для такой признанной звезды как Анна Нетребко, задача непростая и даже рискованная. Опера ставится часто, партии сложные, существуют многочисленные записи великих исполнителей основных ролей. Но оказалось, что даже Анна Нетребко способна превзойти сама себя, хотя уже давно стоит в одном ряду с величайшими оперными дивами столетия. Она нашла новые краски и прочтения, и очень может быть, что именно ее версия главных арий героини скоро станет канонической для тех, кому хватит голоса, техники и таланта, чтобы это спеть.Сама постановка воспринимается неоднозначно. Попытка осовременить и уйти от классических прочтений с хэппи-эндом предъявило Ахиллесову пяту в виде перегиба в область секса и насилия. Настойчивое использование обнаженного женского тела скорее может вызвать вопросы у феминисток, а ужесточение темы насилия и жестокости, усиленное 3Д эффектами, и обрезание оперы на сохранившейся авторской версии (счастливый конец дописывали по зарисовкам автора ученики) заставляет зрителя уйти с довольно тягостным впечатлением. И лишь удовольствие от пения Аны Нетребко способно побороть негатив от режиссуры. Кажется, это чувство было близко и дирижеру, "загремевшему" все первое действие с его прекрасными ариями. Но как только раздался изумительный голос Анны, оркестр забыл об агрессии и наслаждался им вместе со зрителями.Общее впечатление осталось сложным, но исполнение Анны Нетребко любимых нами арий все еще звучит в голове и по прошествии времени.

title: マックスヨーゼフ広場に
text: マックスヨーゼフ広場にあります。初代バイエルン王マクシミリアン１世の銅像の向こうにこのバイエルン国立国立歌劇場が見えました。素晴らしく立派な建物でした。

title: Wunderbar
text: Wir waren das erste mal da und sehr angenehm überrascht. eine sehr gute Akustik und eine große Bühne lassen hier große Oper oder andere Spiele zu. wir waren sehr zufrieden und kommen wieder

title: Ideal afternoon in Munich
text: Απίστευτη εμπειρία για κάποιον που δεν έχει πάει ποτέ σε όπερα Όπως εγώ. Να φροντίσεις να κλείσεις εισιτήρια σε ο,οτιδήποτε έχει και αφιέρωσε ένα δίωρο πολιτισμού στον εαυτό σου σε ένα από τα πιο μεγαλοπρεπή κτίρια της πόλης. Σαν όπερα δεν θα μπορούσε να μην έλαμπε και να μην είναι επιβλητική μέσα και έξω.ακομη και στη  Galleria η σε standing seat μπορείς να βλέπεις Όχι βέβαια Όπως σε Αλλά επίπεδα ναι με πιο ακριβά εισιτήρια. Κόσμος ρέει από παντού, ντύσιμο φρόντισε να είναι ιδανικό των περιστάσεων γιατί άλλωστε δεν πας κάθε μέρα όπερα. Τραγικό να μη με αφήσουν να φωτογραφήθω στην σκάλα .
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Classico
text: Teatro della città di Monaco che si affaccia sulla omonima piazza e di fronte  alla residenza reale. Spettacoli ogni giorno e la domenica anche a mezzogiorno. Davanti  c'è la fermata della metro e del tram linea 19
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Einfach eine Klasse für sich
text: Ich war 2019 jetzt das dritte Mal in der Oper. München ist einfach Klasse. Hervorragendes Ambiente, hervorragender Service und Betreuung. Preise für Erfrischungen moderat. Natürlich hochkarätige Besetzungen. Manko, Karten zu erschwinglichen Preisen eher schwierig. Überhaupt an Tickets zu kommen ist eine Herausforderung. Kenner kaufen Stehkarten. Aber da muss man wissen welche.

title: Sightseeing in Munich.
text: The “Bavarian State Opera” you can say that this is one of the world's leading opera houses who can look back on more than 350 years of opera and ballet history. With an amount that reaches around 600,000 guests, who visit more than 450 events a year. Within one season, over 40 operas from five centuries and more than 20 ballets from the 19th century to the present are given, as well as concerts and recitals. This makes the program of the house one of the most international. With 2,101 seats, the Classicist National Theater is the largest opera house in Germany and is considered one of the most beautiful theaters in Europe.

title: バイエルンのオペラの殿堂
text: ニューイヤーイブのコンサート（ジルベスター・コンサート）に行きました。スメタナのチェコ語のオペラ「売られた花嫁」をドイツ語で上演し、電光掲示板で英訳が表示されていました。英語に不馴れだったり、オペラに不馴れだったりしたら、事前にネットなどで内容を予習しておく方が良いです。演出や小道具は現代版にアレンジされたものでした。普段の聴衆がどうかは分かりませんが、ニューイヤーイブコンサートだということもあり、それなりにしっかりした服の方ばかりでした。ウィーン・フィルのように燕尾服の必要はありませんが、男性ならスーツが無難です。女性も豪華なドレスでなくても良いですが、しっかりした服を持っていきましょう。何にせよ、普段着は完全に浮きます。できれば開演より余裕を持って会場入りし、建物内部の豪華な部屋をしっかり堪能してください。

title: ドイツを代表する歌劇場
text: ワーグナーのオペラ「トリスタンとイゾルテ」や「ニュルンベルクのマイスタージンガー」が初演された，ドイツを代表する歌劇場の一つ。マクシミリアン１世の命により，建築家カール·フォン·フィッシャーによって1811年から７年の歳月をかけて建設。その後，火事や戦争で焼失しましたが，戦後，1958年から1963年に再建。今回は，外観だけ見学。

title: 綺麗
text: ここの隣にレジデンツもあります。他にもオシャレなお店も。場所も新市庁舎などから歩いて行けます。像も前に立っているので、写真にも良い。

title: Expensive seats with partially blocked view
text: We love the Staatsoper. The building is splendid, as are the acoustics. The production of “Salome”, though burdened by confusing direction, was generally first-rate, with Marlis Petersen a stunningly effective Salome, and Wolfgang Koch in excellent vocal form as Jochanaan. The supporting singers were also very good. It was odd to have the opera set in the present or very recent past, and starting the opera with one of Mahler’s Kindertotenlieder was bizarre. But, hey, European directors can’t get away with doing things sensibly; the prevailing disease of directoritis forces them to do weird. That is to be expected. And it is not why my review awards only three stars. I object to paying 142 Euros per seat when the view of the stage from our orchestra seats was partially blocked. Warning to others: avoid seats near the sides.

title: impressionnant
text: Très belle bâtisse, bien entretenue. Les espaces sont immenses et très impressionnants; La salle est grande mais l'acoustique est bonne. Accueil et service impeccable

title: Bellissima almeno all'esterno
text: Purtroppo non ho potuto accedere all'interno. Esternamente è bellissima, inserita in un enorme piazzale. Davvero bella. Area "ricca" della città.

title: Imponente
text: Según cuentan con un cartel impresionante de espectáculos de ópera. Este edificio impresiona en sí mismo y además linda con una de las calles comerciales más lujosas de la ciudad. La plaza en la que se encuentra, la Max Joseph Platz, es abierta y de grandes dimensiones en la que destaca sobre todo este edificio.

title: 劇場ツアーに参加
text: ミュンヘン到着日の午後に劇場ツアーに参加しました。予め予約が必要です。ドイツ語しか無いようですが(劇場サイトで予約する場合)英語の説明書をくれたり、時々英語でも話してくれました。内部は豪華で、シャンデリアも素晴らしです。後部の高い席から豪華な劇場全体を見ることができました。ツアーに参加しなければ見られない舞台裏 、練習前の舞台セットの様子も見ることができました。オペラファンでなくても十分楽しむことができます。

title: Go! You will enjoy this building and whichever performance you choose, excellent treasure for Munich!
text: I have been to Munich a few times now, and a visit to the Bavarian State Opera never fails to impress and bring joy. On this trip, we enjoyed one of the season closing performances of the Summer Oper für Alle program. Outdoor performance, top rate, with a sponsored food and drink truck serving on the steps of the opera house after the performance. What a magical night!

title: ハイレベルなオペラを堪能
text: 2日連続で見に行きました。パリのオペラ座やNYのメトロポリタンに比べると、内装は、よく言えば質実剛健。オペラのレベルは十分に高く、世界的な歌手が続々登場し、オペラファンにはたまりません。上階の席はかなり見下ろす形になり、立ち見になっている人もおおかったので、やはりパルテルあるいはせいぜい第一バルコンあたりで見たいところ。なお、夏ですが、半分以上の人はダークスーツ。特に良い席だとジーンズなどでは浮くので、それなりにオシャレしていきましょう。

title: Impressive building next to the palace
text: This building combines well with the Residenz on the platz.  We did not get to visit the interior because there were no performances while we were in Munich.  However, we did greatly enjoy it as a backdrop for great pictures.

title: Μόναχο!Πολιτισμός και διασκέδαση
text: Γενικά στο Μόναχο τα βρήσκεις όλα!Αυτό το θέατρο ειναι από τα καλύτερα της Γερμανίας κατ εμέ!Και να επιλέξετε μία όπερα του Πουτσίνι

title: Pin-point acoustics
text: We found the on-line booking process quite easy from the UK & there was no-problem with the self-printed tickets.  The instructions said to carry ID as well as the ticket, but this was not requested at the door.For the Sunday morning (11am) orchestral concert we were in the 3rd of the 4 balconies. The view was slightly restricted, but we moved, without problem along the row to more central seats at the interval.  We noticed that – even on a Sunday morning – most men wore jackets & women smart clothes. There were no jeans in sight. The Bavarian State Symphony Orchestra was excellent, as one would expect. They were spread out over the (covered) orchestra pit & stage area.  What we noticed most were the pin point acoustics. Even up ‘in the gods’ we could hear even the quietest notes very clearly from all parts of the stage.  Thoroughly recommended for a concert.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Красивое здание театра
text: Писать про оперу - бессмысленно. Если про здание, то это Мюнхенский национальный театр. Расположен на площади Макса Йосефа. Само здание открыто в 1818 году, позже горело и перестраивалось. Первый архитектор Карл фон Фишер. С 1875 года здесь устраиваются Мюнхенские оперные

title: Ein Blick hinter die Kulissen
text: Nicht jeder hat das Privileg, einen Blick hinter die Kulissen dieses Hauses werfen zu dürfen! Wir hatten dieses Glück an einer privaten Führung teilnehmen zu dürfen, und sind absolut geflasht, wie man auf Neudeutsch sagt

title: Anniversary treat, 7th April
text: Short visit to Munich with the opera Madame Butterfly the highlight. We were not disappointed. The Opera House itself is amazing, breathtaking. We did a”behind the scenes” tour the previous Friday which was so interesting and gave us an insight into how the performance would be managed together with the history of thebuilding which was fascinating. The opera itself was truly magical. ( with German and English subtitles.) Congrats to my husband on such a brilliant Anniversary gift and a memory to treasure.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: 素晴らしいバレエ
text: 事前に公式サイトからチケットを入手し、バレエの「スパルタカス」を観ました。特におしゃれもせず、旅の服装にスポーツシューズで参加しましたが、特別な場としておしゃれをしている方もいれば、子供連れでジーンズで来ている家族もいました。 パフォーマンスは本当に素晴らしく、主演の男性ダンサーOsiel Gouneoさんは配役にぴったりの方で、力強い踊りに魅せられました。 幕間が長いので時間がつぶせるかなと心配しましたが、Wifiが飛んでいるのでストーリーを確認したり、ダンサーについて調べているとあっという間に休憩が終わりました。

title: Wonderful ballet company
text: I saw two ballets: Alice in Wonderland and Anna Karenina. Both shows were wonderful with fabulous dancers. Excellent costumes and sets too. The theatre itself is stunningly pretty. Bar area is nice with good choice of snacks and drinks.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: A Treat for the Opera Lover
text: We saw "Don Giovanni" and loved the performance and appreciated the unique setting/interpretation of this opera.  I noticed some Tripadvisor commentary re: ticket purchases; I purchased online Jan 21 for a March 14 performance and did not have any issues although admittedly, there were not a lot of seat options by that time.  The tickets were available for pick up 1 hour before the performance and the security guards directed us to the correct place to pick them up.  There are German and English translations on a screen over the stage.  Most people were in business/dressy attire.  You are required to check coats, so if you get cold easily bring a wrap to keep with you.  It was a beautiful opera house and a delightful experience.

title: Opera de Munich
text: Esta situado en todo el centro de Munich. Teatro espectacular recomiendo ver una opera en este lugar emblematico del mundo de la opera.

title: Excellent opera house and company, challenging tickets
text: We wanted to see an opera here while visiting Munich in February, 2019. Check out Larry Z's review, below, with the excellent description of the online ticket purchasing process. By the time we started looking, the first batch of online tickets was sold out, so we had to log on at 10 am Munich time on the designated day for sale of the second batch. We ended up with seats on the main floor in the very last row. Despite that, the acoustics were still very good. The opera company was excellent, as were the leads - the woman performing the role of Abigail in "Nabucco" was astonishing! If you speak only English, be careful where you sit. The opera projects translations over the stage in both English and German, very helpful when the opera is in Italian! But the rearmost 3 or four rows on the main floor are under an overhanging balcony that cuts off view of the top of the stage. You can see the performers just fine, but not the projected translations. Instead, there are small LCD screens attached to the ceiling over you (actually, the underneath of the balcony) that show the translation but only in German. Also, the translations in both languages are NOT literal translations of the dialogue, but instead only summaries. To get the full impact of the dialogue, it is worth reading the libretto ahead of time. Dress: most attendees were in business suits for men, nice to elegant dresses for women - it tends to be a moneyed crowd. The very occasional bluejeans stood out for their rarity, and were worn by only the youngest visitors.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Волшебный вечер
text: Сегодня давали оперу «Любовный напиток» Доницетти. Очень понравилось! Постановка не совсем обычная и очень впечатляющая!!! Довольны всем!!! Будет возможность- будем рады сходить еще !!! Волшебный вечер!!!

title: ticket order step by step
text: Hi, I just messed up my ticket order so decided to share what I wish I'd known before:For non-locals there are two ways to get tickets: A WRITTEN order and an ONLINE order. The WRITTEN is available 3 months ahead and the ONLINE exactly 2 months ahead. Via WRITTEN you choose only the category of seats and the theater chooses the seat for you. Via ONLINE you can actually mark the seat you prefer on a map. In WRITTEN, choosing the category is tricky because the seating map available on site has a color code plus a list of prices that is not fully at sync with the map. I couldn’t figure it out entirely. So either call them or play that roulette.Now, the theater reserves tickets in two batches for the two methods. If you don’t ask for tickets early enough either way - tickets will soon run out.For WRITTEN: write a simple email. They will reply with further procedures. At this point you can also call. They answer quickly and kindly. I tried WRITTEN too late so it was sold out for me. But on the phone they instructed me how and when I should try for the second batch.The ONLINE procedure is somewhat like the black Friday sales. It's Attack and Grab and timing is crucial. My advice: on sales day, connect on every electronic device you have about one hour before the sale begins – enter the Staatsoper site –then Schedule – then find your show- then hit "Tickets". You will be forwarded to a clock countdown page and into a queue. When the Gong hits each device will tell you your place in line. Continue with the device of best position. Wait and relax because you only have one chance at this. When your turn comes, the seating map will appear along with that doomed category list again. Zoom into the map with the mouse scroll. Chose a seat, mark it with a mouse click. I was early in queue and I marked dream seats! But here's when I messed it all up – you see, below the map are two buttons "Chose by map" or "Get best seat for category". DO NOT TOUCH THAT. Instead, scroll back to the TOP of the page to "Add to cart" and advance from there. Obvious isn't it? "Get best seat for category" is another search altogether that has nothing to do with the map. It's that roulette again. I wasn't expecting to find it so I advanced with it because it flashed. Why is it there anyway?! Totally illogical.I clicked it thinking it would get me further, instead I got lost in the system, lost my dream seats and accepting worse instead that were arbitrarily chosen for me. I then got stressed out because they only give you 15 minutes for the process or you lose your position. I hope to enjoy the show nevertheless, going to pay a danm lot for it, flight, hotel and all… Al least I hope to spare this despair from you.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Disappointing nutcracker performance
text: Bought two expensive tickets as a Christmas present to see the nutcracker. It seemed to be a modern interpretation and the only link I saw to the original nutcracker was that Clara (or some other name they changed it to) held a nutcracker toy every few scenes. The costumes were boring, the ballet undramatic. I left the ballet completely undazzled. I was incredibly looking forward to the sugar plum fairy, but most of the acts and music were taken from other Tchaikovsky productions i.e swan lake. Super disappointed, shouldn’t have been allowed to call it the nutcracker.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Une Flûte enchanteresse
text: Quel immense plaisir que cette soirée au Staatsoper, d'abord pour la beauté et l'élégance du lieu,( spectateurs sur leur 31 en majorité ! ) et puis, surtout, quel bonheur que cette mise en scène de toute beauté, ravissants décors et costumes, pas de chaise roulante ni de

title: All'opera
text: Ho assistito all'Otello di Verdi in Dicembre 2018, ottimo cast e musica superba. Il teatro è bellissimo, molto ben organizzato, ottimi i servizi e il ristorante, da prenotare per l'intervallo. Per gli amanti dell'opera sicuramente un must!

title: Chocolate box theatre
text: The interior of this theatre is all you could expect from an opera house.  It’s charm is complimented by outstanding refreshment service with many types of food and drink available.  A very large cloakroom caters for winter clothes and there is parking in the square outside.

title: Herrlich
text: Ich war gestern zum ersten Mal überhaupt mit meiner Freundin in der Bayerischen Staatsoper und es war eine Vorstellung der Extraklasse. Verdi vom Feinsten mit international bekannten Opernsängern wie etwa Erwin Schrott. Architektonisch und musikalisch hervorragend, zudem eine

title: Di passaggio
text: Breve passaggio solo all'esterno.  Stile Neoclassico e top di gamma per gli amanti del genere. Si trova in uno dei quartieri piu' chic della citta'.

title: Herrlich
text: Ich war gestern zum ersten Mal überhaupt mit meiner Freundin in der Bayerischen Staatsoper und es war eine Vorstellung der Extraklasse. Verdi vom Feinsten mit international bekannten Opernsängern wie etwa Erwin Schrott. Architektonisch und musikalisch hervorragend, zudem eine wirklich gute Verpflegung mit Tartar, Lachs, etc.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: wunderschönes Gebäude von innen und aussen
text: wunderschönes Gebäude von innen und such von aussen.Ich liebe den Anblick der Oper in wunderschönen Umgebung Odeonsplatz und Maximilianstr. Egal ob Oper oder Ballett es lohnt sich auch -von innen- anzuschauen.Tolles Ambiente von innen und aussen. Unbedingt anschauen, wenn möglich mit Aufführung.

title: 重厚なオペラハウスで観劇と幕間のシャンパンやワイン、ヨーロッパの醍醐味
text: 短期間の滞在でしたが、土曜の夜「リゴレット」を観劇できました。開演は午後7時半ですが、神殿風の外観を持つエントランスから早めに入場。開演前に、まずカナッペやサンドイッチなどを軽くつまみながらシャンペンやワインを楽しみます。ここのケータリングはダルマイヤーなので軽食も美味しい。客席は円筒状で天井には大きなシャンデリア。50ユーロの3階席を予約してありましたが、舞台はやや見づらいものの、オーケストラピットがバッチリ見え、お高い席でなくても雰囲気は十分に堪能できます。立ち席にも大勢のファンが詰めています。幕間にはシャンデリアきらめく待合でまたお酒をいただきながら待つ楽しさ。終演までたっぷり3時間、ホテルには午後11時の帰着となりますが、ヨーロッパならではの楽しみ方。それほどゴージャスな服装をする必要もなく、肩ひじ張らずに出かければいいと思います。ヨーロッパ歌劇場めぐり、お薦めします。
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Casa de Ópera regular
text: Estive nesta casa de Ópera num sábado à noite para a apresentação da ópera Rigoletto. Muito bonito por dentro, é mais impressionante por fora, aparentando uma imponência que não se replica dentro, porém como a maior Casa de Ópera de Munique, é aqui que se fazem as grandes apresentações.

title: Di passaggio
text: Breve passaggio solo all'esterno.  Stile Neoclassico e top di gamma per gli amanti del genere. Si trova in uno dei quartieri piu' chic della citta'.

title: Повезло попасть на Мюнхенский Оперный фестиваль 2018 года.
text: Смотрели прекрасную оперу  "сицилийская вечерня" Верди. Постановка была довольно современной, но от этого не менее интересной. Прекрасные голоса, интересная трактовка оперы, красивые интерьеры самого здания......вечер удался.))

title: Excellente maison d'opéra
text: Sans doute le meilleur Opéra européen, grâce à la qualité de sa programmation et des distributions.Intérieurs jolis.Plusieurs bars, aux différents niveaux du théâtre, avec des prix modérés.Personnel très aimable et efficace.Maison que je recommande fortement.Si l'on n'arrive pas à réserver de billets via l'Opéra, on peut en obtenir par des revendeurs agréés (appliquant évidemment des frais supplémentaires).Je n'attribue pas la meilleure note à cause du système de pré-réservation (hors abonnements) qui est assez opaque et, soi-disant, allouerait les billets par tirage au sort compte tenu des demandes plus élevées que les offres.Deux mois avant le début d'un spectacle hors Festival d'opéra annuel, ouvrent les réservations au guichet, au téléphone et sur Internet, et bien souvent, il ne reste plus beaucoup de places, surtout si sont programmés des chanteurs ou chanteuses stars.Quant au 'Münchner Opernfestspiele' (Festival d'opéra se déroulant entre juin et juillet), une fois les places attribuées (en février) aux heureux spectateurs désignés par le sort (ou autrement...), a lieu une première vente de billets d'opéras (et de ballets aussi) dans les catégories V à VIII, au guichet, organisée durant une seule journée de janvier.Ce n'est qu'en mars que démarrent les réservations sur place, par téléphone et en ligne pour les places restantes – parfois, comme lors du Festival de l'été 2018, il peut arriver qu'il n'y ait plus de billets pour certains spectacles affichés complets.

title: Beautiful Opera House
text: This is a beautiful opera house!! This is a beautiful building and very worthwhile to visit.  I highly recommend it!

title: Guided tour of the opera house
text: I only discovered that these tours existed as the guide on our walking tour mentioned it. One can book online or at the box office, and costs €10. The tour takes about 1 1/4 hours and includes going backstage (which is *gigantic* !).

title: Mooi gebouw
text: De buitenkant van de opera is behoorlijk indrukwekkend.  We hebben wel niet de tijd/kans gehad om de binnenkant te bezoeken.

title: Gorgeous house; great singing; occasionally problematic production
text: The Nationaloper is one of the great houses in the world, with excellent acoustics and good sight lines, and it is always a delight to attend a performance in it. This time it was The Marriage of Figaro, which featured several fine performances, especially Federico Lombardi as the Countess and Olga Kulchynska as Susanna. Anne Sofie von Otter was very good as Marcellina; Marcus Eiche, stepping in on short notice to replace Christian Gerhaher as the Count, was impressive. Alex Esposito as Figaro fell somewhat short both dramatically and vocally. The production was problematic at times, especially in the last act. Christof Loy was unable to avoid some of the  incomprehensible touches without which few performances in Germany manage to do without. What’s with the doors, Mr. Loy, which keep becoming larger without any perceptible link to the story? And why did Ms Von Otter sing a Mozart song which is not part of the opera?
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Opera in Munich - get to see one!
text: Amazing, gorgeous opera house and theatre. Saw a superb version of L'elisir d'amore with Vittorio Griggolo, amongst others. Beautiful production, imaginative with first class voices. Interesting to see the Munich glitterati out in their Sunday best!

title: architektonisch und musikalisch Spitzenklasse
text: Von außen gibt es natürlich Häuser, die deutlich mehr hermachen, aber innen ist dieses Haus herausragend. Farblich beherrschen die Farben Hellblau, Weiß und Gold die Räume, was einen überragenden Eindruck macht. Im Zuschauerraum selbst dominiert königliches Rot, Weiß und Gold. Alles ist prachtvoll, aber nicht protzig; üppig, aber nicht überladen; vornehm, aber nicht abweisend. Musikalisch gehört die Staatsoper natürlich zu den bedeutendsten Häusern in Deutschland, aber für das Geld, das die Stadt und der Freistaat dafür ausgeben, und das auch vom Zuschauer verlangt wird, muss man Spitzenklasse erwarten, die auch geboten wird.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Bayerische Staatsoper
text: Sehr nette Bedienung und gutes Essen in einer gemütlichen Ambiente.Schattiges Plätzien auf den Stufen der Bayrischen Staatsoper.

title: Unforgettable evening
text: We were lucky enough to hear a gala performance by Edita Gruberova at the opera house. The venue is of surreal beauty and the singing was hauntingly thrilling. We shall never forget her performance of the Don Giovanni aria - singing like that takes decades of experience and feeling to create and we were lucky to witness it. The five or six standing ovations and two encores at the end amid the general uproar were amazing to behold.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Unvergessliche Opernabende
text: Die Staatsoper bietet bereits von Aussen einen prachtvollen Anblick, ebenso schön ist das Innere ausgestattet. Der Spielplan ist sehr abwechslungsreich, es treten viele "Weltstars" auf. Absolutes Highlight ist der Dirigent, Herr Petrenko, der viele unvergessliche Opernabende

title: 大きい
text: すごく大きな劇場でした。人気の劇場のためか、チケットも高いです。観客はみなきちんとおしゃれな服装で、さすがだなと思いました。

title: Здание оперы
text: Баварская опера является символом города, на площади рядом с ней всегда многолюдно, поскольку рядом расположена Мюнхенская резиденция. Посетить не получилось.

title: Magnificent Rosenkavalier production
text: I visited the Bayerische Staatsoper in late March 2018, and one of the performances I attended was Rosenkavalier. This was a legendary production by Jürgen Rose and Otto Schenk. The set design was for the second act was such a marvel that it received an applause on its own. Only afterwards I learned that this was actually the last performance of this production - or so the opera house announced.

title: Amazing evening
text: Coming off a wonderful "The taming of the shrew", with the amazing Sergei Polunin, special guest of the company. I can never thank the Bayerische Staatsballet enough for evenings like this!  Nice atmosphere, friendly staff. Highly recommended.

title: Unvergessliche Opernabende
text: Die Staatsoper bietet bereits von Aussen einen prachtvollen Anblick, ebenso schön ist das Innere ausgestattet. Der Spielplan ist sehr abwechslungsreich, es treten viele"Weltstars" auf. Absolutes Highlight ist der Dirigent, Herr Petrenko, der viele unvergessliche Opernabende geleitet hat. Die Inszenierungen gehen mehrheitlich in eine moderne Richtung. Plätze ohne Sichteinschränkung sind etwas teuerer, ideal ist ein Sitzplatz im Bereich Balkon oder Rang. Auch die Ballettaufführungen sind sehr zu empfehlen.

title: 大きい
text: すごく大きな劇場でした。人気の劇場のためか、チケットも高いです。観客はみなきちんとおしゃれな服装で、さすがだなと思いました。

Only afterwards I learned that this was actually the last performance of this production - or so the opera house announced.

title: Wunderbar!
text: Wir haben hier an Silvester die Fledermaus angeschaut und waren total begeistert. Auch wenn man das Stück schon x-mal gesehen hat, machte sich im Nationaltheater besonders viel Spaß.

title: A special treat
text: There’s a sense of occasion here that you don’t always get at the Opera or ballet.  It’s a perfect chocolate box theatre with helpful staff and comfortable seats.  The interval refreshments are served quickly and are tasty.  There is parking in the underground car park in the

title: Prachtvoll
text: Die Bayerische Staatsoper ist von Innen und Außen ein prachtvolles Gebäude. Leider haben wir es nur besichtigt und nicht im Zusammenhang mit einer Opernaufführung erlebt.

title: Opera de Munique
text: Avistei de longe o belíssimo prédio da Opera de Munique no final da tarde. A noite estava caindo e as luzes amarelas realçavam a beleza do prédio

text: Wir haben das Stück "L´elisir d´amore" gesehen was eine großartige Inszenierung war mit außergewöhnlichen Solisten. Das Bühnenbild war grandios. Das Gebäude ist wunderschön und sehr prunkvoll. Jede Etage hat seine eigene Garderobe, was sehr angenehm ist für die Jacken-Rückgabe.

title: A special treat
text: There’s a sense of occasion here that you don’t always get at the Opera or ballet.  It’s a perfect chocolate box theatre with helpful staff and comfortable seats.  The interval refreshments are served quickly and are tasty.There is parking in the underground car park in the square.  There are lifts to all floors in the theatre.Return tickets are often sold by the entrance by people who aren’t touts but just want to sell tickets at face value.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: L´elisir d´amore
text: Wir haben das Stück "L´elisir d´amore" gesehen was eine großartige Inszenierung war mit außergewöhnlichen Solisten. Das Bühnenbild war grandios. Das Gebäude ist wunderschön und sehr prunkvoll. Jede Etage hat seine eigene Garderobe, was sehr angenehm ist für die Jacken-Rückgabe. Es gab leider kein richtiges Programm zu dieser speziellen Oper, sondern nur ein Programm-Buch für 8€. Etwas zu essen gibt es an verschiedenen Orten im Haus, vor allem an einer Bar/ kleines Restaurant in einem Zwischengeschoss. Man kann sich auch für die Pause Speisen und Getränke vor dem Stück bestellen und bezahlen, die dann auf einem Tisch bereits platziert sein werden in der Pause. Der Saal verfügt über mehrere Rang-Etagen die jeweils 2-5 Sitzreihen hat. Wir saßen in der zweiten Rang-Etage in der zweiten Reihe sehr weit rechts. Deshalb war das Sichtfeld leider recht eingeschränkt (ca. 70% der Bühne konnten wir sehen. Der Text der italienischen (?) Oper wurde sowohl auf Deutsch als auch auf Englisch über der Bühne auf einem Bildschirm gezeigt. Der Opern-Besuch war auf jeden Fall ein großes Highlight!

title: Grandiose Oper mit exzellenten Aufführungen
text: Die Oper in München gehört sicher zu den schönsten der Welt. Für die technikinteressierten ist auch eine der Führungen empfehlenswert. Für den Opernliebhaber im DACH-Raum ist ein Besuch sozusagen Pflicht. Zuletzt sah ich Lucia di Lammermoor von Donizetti. Aufführung (viel

title: Опера Доницетти
text: Мы смотрели оперу Доницетти  Лучия ди Ламмермур . Это было потрясающее и незабываемое событие! Лучию пела наша певица Ольга Пудова. Голоса были красивые ,и все очень старались , были убедительны настолько, что многие плакали... Очень рекомендую. Билеты в партер дорогие: 190€ ,

title: Un temple de l'art lyrique
text: Quel écrin, tout d'abord. Un des plus beaux théâtres a l'italienne d'Europe. Une programmation hors pair. Accueil, gestion des réservations, billetterie... tout est parfaitement huilé. Quel plaisir d'y entendre le grand Kaufmann et la sublime Harteros, tous deux pensionnaires de

title: Staatstragend!
text: Großes geschichtsträchtiges Opernhaus mit einer riesigen Bühne. Teuer, wertvolles und sich sehr lohnendes Ambiente. Frühzeitig Karten buchen! Die Vorstellungen sind klasse. Es ist Toleranz gegenüber der Kleidung mancher Zuschauer zu üben ...

title: poor sitting layout and bad acoustics
text: I was twice to this place. First time i had cheap tickets so i had a place on 5th floor. I could not really use the sit because you can't see anything. That time it was a ballet so there was no singing. The sound was good. The orchestra area has very good acoustics.  Second time

title: Grandiose Oper mit exzellenten Aufführungen
text: Die Oper in München gehört sicher zu den schönsten der Welt. Für die technikinteressierten ist auch eine der Führungen empfehlenswert. Für den Opernliebhaber im DACH-Raum ist ein Besuch sozusagen Pflicht. Zuletzt sah ich Lucia di Lammermoor von Donizetti. Aufführung (viel Applaus) wie auch Ambiente (Schlendern in den Wandelhallen) sind immer wieder ein Erlebnis. Einziges Manko: Oft ausverkauft.

title: Опера Доницетти
text: Мы смотрели оперу Доницетти Лучия ди Ламмермур . Это было потрясающее и незабываемое событие! Лучию пела наша певица Ольга Пудова. Голоса были красивые ,и все очень старались , были убедительны настолько, что многие плакали...Очень рекомендую. Билеты в партер дорогие: 190€ , но это того стоит!!!!
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Un temple de l'art lyrique
text: Quel écrin, tout d'abord. Un des plus beaux théâtres a l'italienne d'Europe. Une programmation hors pair. Accueil, gestion des réservations, billetterie... tout est parfaitement huilé.Quel plaisir d'y entendre le grand Kaufmann et la sublime Harteros, tous deux pensionnaires de cette royale institution. André Chenier, un régal. Et ce soir: Lucia di Lamermoor avec Beczela et Tézier (Damrau malade, quel dommage).

title: Staatstragend!
text: Großes geschichtsträchtiges Opernhaus mit einer riesigen Bühne. Teuer, wertvolles und sich sehr lohnendes Ambiente. Frühzeitig Karten buchen! Die Vorstellungen sind klasse. Es ist Toleranz gegenüber der Kleidung mancher Zuschauer zu üben ...

title: poor sitting layout and bad acoustics
text: I was twice to this place. First time i had cheap tickets so i had a place on 5th floor. I could not really use the sit because you can't see anything. That time it was a ballet so there was no singing. The sound was good. The orchestra area has very good acoustics.Second time i went to Tosca. In the first 2 acts i could not hear the singers. The decor behind them absorbed a lot of the singing and the orchestra was masking the other part of the sound. In the last 2 acts, the decor changed and the sound improved but just by a bit. I have been to a much better opera house where you could hear the singers from all sits in the place.Second time i also had much better tickets. I was on the 3rd floor but i still had to lean on to see something. Even with the leaning i could still not see the whole scene. The construction of the place is very very bad.I would recommend going to a symphonic concert since you don't have to actually see anything, just listen to the instruments. For that, this place would be ok.Anything that requires you to see the scene, requires you to buy the most expensive tickets and sit on either first floor center, or ground floor.

title: Good
text: Ate here based on TripAdvisor reviews. The place is big and has a nice atmosphere. The food (both of us had pasta dishes) was good although nothing special. Husband had tiramisu for desert which was nice.

title: Just from outside
text: The building is beautiful at least from outside, in a great square. Have to see it from architectural point.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Cosi fan tutti
text: Von Mozart! Eine traumhafte Aufführung die mich zu Tränen gerührt hat und zum Lachen! Das Opernhaus selber ist ein Traum, die Akustik Spitzenklasse! Schön ist es wenn die Besucher auch sehenswert sind! Zerrissene Jeans und Sweatshirt ist ein Unding und des Gesamterlebnisses unwürdig!!!
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Belo prédio com colunas coríntias
text: A Casa da Ópera de Munique, também conhecida como Teatro Nacional (abriga, além da Ópera, o Balé do Estado da Baviera), destaca-se na Max-Joseph Platz, por seu estilo arquitetônico que incorpora elementos neo-gregos. Como muitos prédios em Munique, o teatro foi destruído durante a segunda guerra, tendo sido reaberto noas anos 60, após a reconstrução feita com base nos planos originais.

title: Cultura musicale tedesca
text: Un bellissimo edificio in stile neoclassico fatto edificare ai primi dell'ottocento da Massimiliano I che per finanziarlo alzò i balzelli sulla birra. E' stato modificato e ricostruito con precisione nei secoli sul modello originale, specie dopo i bombardamenti della seconda Guerra Mondiale. Esternamente ricorda un tempio greco. All'interno ha forma circolare con una serie di ordini di palchi con i color porpora ed oro a determinare l'impatto visivo. Un magnifico teatro dove ha sede l'opera di stato bavarese. Merita sicuramente una visita fuori ma specialmente all'interno.

title: Bela construção
text: É uma construção muito bonita na Max-Joseph-Platz no comecinho da Maximilianstraße, a rua das lojas de grife. Fica uns 400 metros da Marienplatz.

title: lovely panorama
text: standing in the middle and get the panorama view of 3 buildings is great. the building is huge and beautiful

title: Facciata imponente
text: Uscendo dal Hofgarten e vicino la Residenza abbiamo visto l'imponente facciata del teatro nazionale.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: 夢だった7月のオペラ・フェスティバル後半
text: 何度かここでオペラは体験していたが、いつかは7月のオペラ・フェスティバルには行きたいと思っていた。それほど、後半の演目やキャストは充実しており、チケットが取りにくい。今回はカウフマンのチケットは取れないまま、出発かと思っていたら、前日にやっと1日分とれて、あともう1日分は、到着した晩の夜中にネットでとった。ミュンヘンに居るだけで、毎晩ガランチャ、ダムラウ、ハロテロスそしてカウフマンが見られる、聞けるなんて最高！

title: 享受！
text: 事先在網路上買票，列印出來就可以在華麗的歌劇院聽優美的歌劇。每年六月底到七月底是歌劇節，每天都有演出，還有賣站票，才11歐元，前方有可以靠的扶手，最好是早點買到有位子的座位。中場休息時間可以欣賞大廳內部華麗裝潢，優美的歌聲即使聽不懂也會覺得很享受。只可惜不懂德文（有字幕）⋯在慕尼黑幾天行程中，全家人一致覺得這個經驗最值。需要稍微注意儀容，不然會覺得很突兀。

title: Esperando encontrar fecha para disfrutar de una ópera en este soberbio edificio
text: Este soberbio edificio se encuentra en el centro de Munich, muy cerquita de la conocida Marienplatz. Aquí comienza la calle con mas caché de la ciudad, Maximilianstrasse. Esta construcción de estilo neoclásico es imponente por su tamaño y muy bonita. Me quedé con las ganas de acudir a algún concierto de ópera para conocerla por dentro.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Восхищение
text: Была на премьере оперы "Андре Шенье" с моим любимым Кауфманом. Потрясающая постановка. Кауфман как всегда великолепен. Но меня поразили и сама опера - очень красивая, и зрители - нарядные, одухотворенные. Это просто праздник. Хотелось бы отметить работу консьержей  - очень отзывчивые ребята. В опере нельзя фотографировать, но, да простит меня Баварская опера, я это сделала

title: A bela ópera
text: Esta bela construção fica na Max-Joseph-Platz e é bem interessante. Nela funciona a ópera e rende ótimas fotos de sua fachada.

title: Nice opera buiding, good catering and great opera
text: We went to see Mussorgkys Boris Godunow in the Bayerische Staatsoper. We had very good seats (row 4). Opera prices in Germany are not as extreme expensive as in Austria. In our case € 100 p.p.. The opera was great; music & singers. Catering is good. The opera building is very nice, acoustic is good.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: prachtige zaal maar niet overal goed te zien en de opera in Salzburg was beter gekleed
text: de zaal was echt prachtig. en daarvoor gingen we ook. ik wist wel dat er wat beperkt zicht was bij de "iets goedkopere" kaartjes, maar had aan het einde van de voorstelling behoorlijke nekpijn van het vooroverleunen. ik had niet goed van te voren gezien dat de zaal iets ronder is dan ik gewend was, waardoor het podium lastig te zien was. ik dacht juist wel aardige plekken te hebben. in de pauze wat drinken gekocht en heb nog nooit een barman zo snel te werk zien gaan, echt goed gedaan, helaas was mijn water alleen niet gekoeld en op een warme dag in een toch wel aardig warme zaal was dat best lekker geweest.maar we hebben er wel van genoten. de dag erop waren we in Salzburg en daar zagen we toch wel een nog wel weer een heel ander publiek. zo mooi allen gekleed en dat mistte Munchen net iets in de sfeer. gala kleding, want je zag er van alles rondlopen. de mensen naast ons waren gekleed in een korte leger broek en een tuinbroek. dat past niet echt bij een opera en bij Salzburg zag je zoiets ook gewoon echt niet.dat maakt het 4 sterren ipv 5 zoals in Salzburg
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Once in Munich you MUST pay a visit!
text: Beautiful architecture, royal decoration, state of the art performances.You may have a drink inside and leave your coat with no extra charge!
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Guided Tour of the National Theatre
text: We tried to book online this guided tour but failed.  Then we emailed the Theatre but still they won't reply.  Then my daughter translated the gmail to German and we got our reply the next day.  We were glad to get to go inside to see the whole back stage and explained clearly how marvelous the show will be.  Even we cannot get to see the show there but still it was a great experience.  I talked to the guide about our bookings and hopefully they will entertain bookings in English also.

title: One of the best
text: This theatre is one of the prettiest in Europe with a very civilised attitude towards the arts.  If you can't get Opera tickets the ballet is always good value.  Their production of A Midsummer Night's Dream is a gem.  The bar service at the interval is second to none despite great demand.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Gelungene Aufführung
text: Die Opern die im Nationaltheater aufgeführt werden sind gut inszeniert und rechtfertigen auf alle Fälle die hohen Kartenpreise. In den Pausen ist es sehr voll an den Essens- und Getränkeausgaben. Das Personal ist sehr bemüht und freundlich. Es lohnt sich also in eine Oper hier zu gehen. Um an die Karten zu kommen sollte man am besten bereits 2-3 Monate davor buchen.

title: Nabucco
text: Sehr schickes Ambiente. Man sollte allerdings wieder Wert auf Anzugspflicht oder zumindest Sakko legen.Sweatshirt und Turnschuhe sind ein NOGO
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Herrlich!
text: Jede Vorstellung, ob Oper oder Ballett die ich in der Bayerische Staatsoper besucht habe war wunderbar. Die Akteure sind stets von höchstem Rang und die Inszenierungen sehr gelungen. Bereits für 17 EUR kann man eine wunderschönen Ballettvorstellung erleben und das sehr prunkvoll elegante Flair des Hauses genießen...  Bei diesen günstigen Tickets empfiehlt es sich, lieber weiter weg aber dafür mittig zu sitzen, als am Rand.

title: La culla delle opere di Wagner
text: Il Nationaltheater, sede dell'Opera di Stato della Baviera, dell'Orchestra di Stato della Baviera, del Balletto di Stato della Baviera e del festival lirico "Münchner Opernfestspiele" (il più antico festival nel suo genere) è senza alcun dubbio il teatro più importante e famoso della città bavarese. E' anche considerato tra i cinque migliori teatri d'opera al mondo, con la sua produzione di lirica sempre ad alti livelli, sia per la qualità dei cantanti e dei direttori d'orchestra che delle messe in scena.L'edificio fu commissionato dal principe elettore e primo re di Baviera Massimiliano I.Dopo pochi anni dalla sua inaugurazione il teatro subì la distruzione a causa di un incendio, ma fu subito dopo riedificato, soprattutto grazie a nuove tassazioni sulla produzione della birra.Lo stile del teatro è neoclassico e il suo ingresso ricorda quello di un tempio della Grecia antica, con frontone e colonne.Al Nationaltheater è soprattutto legato il ricordo delle tante prime rappresentazioni delle opere di Richard Wagner, ma anche per i lavori di Richard Strauss. Nuovamente distrutto quasi completamente nell'ottobre del 1943 da un bombardamento aereo durante la seconda guerra mondiale, fu di nuovo ricostruito negli anni Sessanta del secolo scorso.Purtroppo non siamo riusciti a visitarlo all'interno ma la possenza dimostrata dalla facciata rievocano i fasti della Monaco dei Wittelsbach.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: バイエルン国立歌劇場
text: 町の中心にあります。堂々とした立派な建物です。今回は外観しか見ることは出来ませんでしたが、次回は中で音楽鑑賞したいです。外観だけでも素晴らしいです。

title: バルコニー席が豪華
text: ガイドツアーで内部を見学しました。赤い内装の壁がシックで豪華でした。バルコニー席は憧れるぐらい素敵でした。午後からの公演がありましたが、時間に余裕がなく観ることが出来ず残念でした。

title: Ottimo teatro
text: È un teatro grande ed efficiente, forse non deduttivo. Vi ho assistito ad un bel Tristano ed Isotta, ben diretto e ben cantato. Ottimo anche il ristorante: nel secondo intervallo abbiamo trovato il nostro tavolo già imbandito con le nostre scelte. Che dire, sono abituato a teatri più piccoli e di fascino.
